recipes.name: Macaron
instructions: Sift almond flour and powdered sugar together.
Make a sugar syrup by boiling sugar and water to 118°C.
Pour sugar syrup into whipped egg whites and continue whipping until cool.
Fold almond flour and powdered sugar into meringue.
Pipe onto baking sheets and let rest for 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Earl Gray Bouchon
instructions: Cream eggs, sugar, butter and vanilla.
Fold in flour, tea and salt .
recipes.notes: Make sure to not fill the mould too much, as the bouchon will rise in the oven. Spray the mould with non-stick spray before filling.

recipes.name: Tomatillo Salsa
instructions: Blend all ingredients together and serve.
recipes.notes: This salsa is great with tortilla chips or fish tacos.

recipes.name: Aioli
instructions: In a food processor, blend egg yolks, mustard, and garlic.
Slowly drizzle in oil until mixture emulsifies.
Add lemon juice, water, and salt to taste.
recipes.notes: This aioli is great with cornmeal fried eggplant or tomatillo salsa.

techniques.name: Chocolate Tempering
techniques.description: Tempering chocolate stabilizes it for dipping or coating by melting, cooling, and reheating to specific temperatures. This ensures a glossy finish and crisp texture.
techniques.notes: When tempering chocolate, avoid any contact with water as it causes the chocolate to seize.
